FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Command being processed (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep alive, 3: Successful Completion, 4: Failed Completion, 5: Invalid Request, 6: Final Message)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the Command

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: RELEASE-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time command finished being released from the front end processor to the remote tracking station.

FIELD.NAME: XTCE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status codes from the OMG XML Telemetric and Command data Exchange data specification. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Invalid, 3: TransferredToRange, 4: SentFromRange, 5: Received, 6: Accepted, 7: Queued,, 8: Executing, 9: Complete, 10: Failed)

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Additional data that may be desired along with the completion status
